page.title: 14Leisure activities
page.content: I have found that one of the most popular pastimes of children in this area is home computing and video games.Only 4 years ago a home computer was a rarity.They are especially popular in the long winter evenings when at one time people would just have watched television,read or knitted.Another popular activity is fishing.In the fishing season there are many local fishing contests down on the River Parrett.Recently there was a lot of controversy over the use of bronze maggots and lead shot.Both are potentially dangerous to wildlife that inhabit the banks of local streams and rivers.The maggots are now banned and lead shot is slowly being replaced by a new kind of shot that is non_toxic.
